channel.title: 317 Co Owner Crown Help!
channel.description:
I have created a Player Rights "4" for owner and kept "3" for Co Owner. I have changed many of the owner only commands to "4" and many of the owner commands are still "3" for Co Owner too.
My Problem- The Crown can be switched for either Owner or Co Owner through this code:
if (playerRights == 4) { out.write(2); // Crown fixup
} else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level } in "if (playerRights == 4)" that makes me the Owner have the crown. If i switch it to if "(playerRights == 3)" the Co Owner gets crown instead of me.
Main Question- How do I make it give me a crown for both Owner and Co Owner? Doing "if (playerRights >= 3) or any code that consolidates the crowns just crashes the client.
Please Help!
Sincerely,
TheCyberMan
NOTE: THIS IS FROM AN ALLSTAR-SCAPE BASE

item.title: 317 Co Owner Crown Help!
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Crowns are added through the client, while reading the bits of the playerRight, which are sent from the server.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Co Owner Crown Help!
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I have created a Player Rights “4” for owner and kept “3” for Co Owner. I have changed many of the owner only commands to “4” and many of the owner commands are still “3” for Co Owner too.

My Problem- The Crown can be switched for either Owner or Co Owner through this code:

      if (playerRights == 4) {
            out.write(2); // Crown fixup


        } else {
            out.write(playerRights); // mod level
        }

in “if (playerRights == 4)” that makes me the Owner have the crown. If i switch it to if “(playerRights == 3)” the Co Owner gets crown instead of me.

Main Question- How do I make it give me a crown for both Owner and Co Owner? Doing
"if (playerRights >= 3) or any code that consolidates the crowns just crashes the client.

Please Help!

Sincerely,

TheCyberMan

NOTE: THIS IS FROM AN ALLSTAR-SCAPE BASE

Read full topic
